name: pawsitive
description: Professional furry-themed Discord bot platform with advanced image interactions

scripts.dev: bash -lc 'bun run bot:dev & bun run api:dev & bun run dashboard:dev; wait'
scripts.build: bash -lc 'for d in packages/config packages/types packages/shared packages/db apps/bot apps/api apps/dashboard; do echo "==> $d"; (cd $d && bun run build) || exit 1; done'
scripts.lint: bun run lint:biome && bun run lint:astro
scripts.typecheck: bash -lc 'for d in packages/config packages/types packages/shared packages/db apps/bot apps/api apps/dashboard; do echo "==> $d"; (cd $d && bun run typecheck) || exit 1; done'
scripts.clean: bash -lc 'for d in packages/config packages/types packages/shared packages/db apps/bot apps/api apps/dashboard; do echo "==> $d"; (cd $d && bun run clean) || exit 1; done'
